thi-ap21:25.2: balimajjhāsayo → khalitajjhāsayo (bj); baliṁ paccāharaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); mālapaccāhataṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap21:30.3: Na ca dāni puno atthi → taṁ vandāmi puna natthi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap21:33.3: Migaṁ uṇṇā yathā evaṁ → cittapuṇṇāyatāneva (sya1ed, sya2ed); migaṁ puṇṇāyateneva (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap21:45.4: īdisaṁ cintayiṁ → iti saṁcintayiṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); iti sañcintayiṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
